subject: Investing
title: When to Sell a Rental Property
description: A fast breakdown of When to Sell a Rental Property for builders.

hook.text: A landlord held a property for 18 years. She could have earned more by selling after year 10.

buildup.text: Sell signals include flat cash flow, a hot market premium, rising capex, or better opportunities.

discovery.text: A 1031 exchange lets you defer capital gains tax by rolling proceeds into a new property.

twist.text: Emotional attachment to a property has cost investors millions in missed opportunity gains.

climax.text: Set clear return benchmarks. When a property underperforms, redeploy capital, don't hope.

punchline.text: Knowing when to sell is as valuable as knowing when to buy.

quiz.question: What does a 1031 exchange allow?
options: Deferring capital gains by reinvesting in property
